channel.title: Comments on: Another repeat of the XPages workshop

item.title: By: Ben Dubuc
item.dc:creator: Ben Dubuc
item.description: <p>is it possible to know who you are talking to in Canada? I have been in contact with someone in Montreal and she was looking for someone to talk to about this workshop.<br /><br />You can contact me by email so that email is not made public, or i can send you my contact's info so you can send her the name of the person you are talking to in Canada.<br /><br />Thanks a lot,<br />Ben</p>
item.content:encoded:
is it possible to know who you are talking to in Canada? I have been in contact with someone in Montreal and she was looking for someone to talk to about this workshop.

You can contact me by email so that email is not made public, or i can send you my contact’s info so you can send her the name of the person you are talking to in Canada.

Thanks a lot,
Ben

item.title: By: Tim Clark
item.dc:creator: Tim Clark
item.description: <p>Hi Benoit,<br /><br />We are currently talking to the folks in Canada about what they are going to do around this.<br /><br />Tim Clark</p>
item.content:encoded:
Hi Benoit,

We are currently talking to the folks in Canada about what they are going to do around this.

Tim Clark

item.title: By: Benoit Dubuc
item.dc:creator: Benoit Dubuc
item.description: <p>Any plans to come to Canada (Toronto or Montreal)?<br /><br />I have been in contact with IBM and they can't tell if we'll have that workshop over here... It would be great!<br /><br />Thanks</p>
item.content:encoded:
Any plans to come to Canada (Toronto or Montreal)?

I have been in contact with IBM and they can’t tell if we’ll have that workshop over here… It would be great!

Thanks
